name: Ris Krem

ingredients.name: Red Sauce (I use Strawberry Daquiri Mix)

steps: Cook rice and salt in milk in double boiler (or low heat) until rice is soft and mixture is thick ... about 1 1/2 hours.
Stir it more often as the rice starts to absorb the milk.
Add sugar and almond extract. Chill. Add chopped almonds and 1 whole almond for the almond game. Stir in whipped cream. Serve with fruit sauce.
